consent.title: Cookie Management and RGPD Consent
consent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze our traffic and personalize our content. By continuing to use our site, you accept our privacy policy.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the website to function (session, security). They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Allow us to analyze site usage to improve our services (Google Analytics, etc.).

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to send you personalized advertising and marketing communications.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Remember your choices (language, theme, settings) to improve your experience.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: Used by integrated third-party services (videos, maps, social networks, etc.).

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.description: Necessary to provide our skills assessment services. You can continue without consenting, but some features will be limited.

profiling.title: Profiling and Automated Decisions
profiling.description: Use of AI for profile analysis and personalized recommendations.

hero.title: Give new life to your career
hero.subtitle: Personalized skills assessment with AI and expert guidance

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: In-depth analysis of your skills with advanced AI algorithms

personalized.title: 100% Personalized
personalized.description: Recommendations tailored to your profile and aspirations

expert.title: Expert Guidance
expert.description: Certified advisors to guide you in your professional development
